titleStmt.title: A copy of the late Lord Chief Justice Pollexfen's opinion, which he gave Mr. Richard Murray, in the year 1686 when he opposed the reading of the Scotch decree in the Court of Chancery in Ireland as being no evidence to be admitted.
titleStmt.author: Pollexfen, Henry, Sir, 1632?-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: Hen. Pollexfen. Junij 5th 1686.
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Docket title same as caption title.
Reproduction of original in: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
